alert.note: Alert for Denali (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 10 at 6:39AM AKDT until April 10 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT TODAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. North winds gusting to 35 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Along the Parks Highway south of the Denali Park Entrance. * WHEN...Until noon AKDT today. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to low visibility on blowing snow. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...North winds gusting to 35 mph along the Parks Highway south of the Denali Park Entrance are causing blowing and drifting snow with low visibility. Winds will decrease about noon today and conditions will improve then.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
